scripts.dev-auto: rimraf dev-dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW_DEV=true SW_INLINE=auto vite --force
scripts.dev-inline: rimraf dev-dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW_DEV=true SW_INLINE=inline vite --force
scripts.dev-script: rimraf dev-dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW_DEV=true SW_INLINE=script vite --force
scripts.dev-auto-destroy: rimraf dev-dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW_DEV=true SW_DESTROY=true SW_INLINE=auto vite --force
scripts.dev-inline-destroy: rimraf dev-dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW_DEV=true SW_DESTROY=true SW_INLINE=inline vite --force
scripts.dev-script-destroy: rimraf dev-dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW_DEV=true SW_DESTROY=true SW_INLINE=script vite --force
scripts.build:serve: npm run build && npm run serve
